R

Random - Class in src.model
Random player: A random computer player strategy that reinforces random a random country, attacks a random number of times a random country, and fortifies a random country, all following the standard rules for each phase.
Random() - Constructor for class src.model.Random
 
randomTerritoryAssignment() - Method in class test_model.TestGameConfig
Checks if the territories are assigned correctly

This function is used to read the map, and store it into the memory using data structures.
